TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IVsaCodeItem implements class Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaItem

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because it is being deprecated in Visual Studio 2005; there will be no replacement for this feature. Please see the ICodeCompiler documentation for additional help.")

summary.span: 表示要通过脚本引擎编译的代码项。

span.span: Represents a code item to be compiled by the script engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的代码项可以包含类、模块或其他源文本。The specified code item can contain classes, modules, or other source text. 调用 IVsaCodeItem 接口的任何成员都不需要任何权限。No permissions are required for calling any members of the IVsaCodeItem interface. 脚本引擎实现此接口以便添加代码项。The script engine implements this interface in order to add code items.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddEventSource (string eventSourceName, string eventSourceType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddEventSource(string eventSourceName, string eventSourceType) cil managed
Public Sub AddEventSource (eventSourceName As String, eventSourceType As String)
public: void AddEventSource(System::String ^ eventSourceName, System::String ^ eventSourceType);
abstract member AddEventSource : string * string -> unit

span.span: A programmatic name of the event source.
The type name of the event source.

summary.span: 将事件源添加到代码项中。

span.span: Adds an event source to the code item.

summary.span: 代码项通过调用 IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance 方法（由宿主实现），使用事件源将事件挂钩到命名事件源。

span.span: The code item uses the event source to hook up an event to the named event source by calling the IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance method, which is implemented by the host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 脚本引擎使用 AddEventSource 方法提供的信息将事件挂钩到命名事件源。The script engine uses information provided by the AddEventSource method to hook up events to the named event source. 它通过调用由主机实现的 (由. Ivsasite.geteventsourceinstance 方法获取事件源。It obtains event sources by calling the IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance method, which is implemented by the host. AddEventSource 方法创建一个类, 用于处理由宿主提供的对象引发的事件。The AddEventSource method creates a class that handles events raised by a host-provided object. > [!NOTE] > JScript .NET 脚本引擎不支持此方法。The JScript .NET script engine does not support this method. 如果 JScript .NET 引擎必须挂钩某个事件, 则必须使用全局项来执行此操作。In cases where the JScript .NET engine must hook up an event, you must do so using a global item. JScript .NET 引擎使用 AppGlobal 项类型, 而不是事件源。Rather than event sources, the JScript .NET engine uses AppGlobal item types. 有关详细信息, 请参阅 VsaItemType。For more information, see VsaItemType. 在代码项中, 你可以按名称访问事件源对象, 并可在访问后针对对象编写事件处理程序。Within the code item, you can access the event source object by name, and, once accessed, you can write event handlers against the object. 事件源类型作为字符串 (而不是类型对象) 传递, 以方便非托管主机实现事件源。The event source type is passed as a string rather than as a Type object to facilitate implementing event sources by unmanaged hosts. 编译器使用 eventSourceType 参数绑定到类型所提供的方法。The compiler uses the eventSourceType parameter to bind to methods provided by the type. 稍后在脚本引擎调用 (由. Ivsasite.geteventsourceinstance 方法请求类型对象的实例时, 也会使用此方法。It is also used later when the script engine calls the IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance method to request an instance of the Type object. 有关为脚本引擎挂接事件的机制的详细信息, 请参阅 (由. Ivsasite.geteventsourceinstance 方法。For more information about the mechanisms for hooking up events for the script engine, see the IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AppendSourceText(string text) cil managed

param.name: text
param.span: 要追加到代码项的文本。

span.span: The text to be appended to the code item.

summary.span: 将指定的文本追加到代码项尾部。

span.span: Appends specified text to the end of the code item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加的源文本不会进行验证。Appended source text is not subjected to validation. 出于此原因, 错误 (如果有) 将在下一次调用 IVsaEngine 方法时出现。For this reason, errors, if any, will surface on the next call to the IVsaEngine.Compile method. 追加的源文本以单个字符串的形式提供。The appended source text is provided as a single string. 如果字符串需要任何格式, 则必须自行提供。Should the string require any formatting, you must provide this yourself.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CodeDOM As CodeObject
public: property System::CodeDom::CodeObject ^ CodeDOM { System::CodeDom::CodeObject ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在代码项中表示的代码文档对象模型 (CodeDOM)。

span.span: Gets the code document object model (CodeDOM) represented in the code item.
The CodeDOM for the code item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CodeDOM 属性通常作为脚本引擎的编译步骤的一部分生成, 因此在调用 IVsaEngine 方法之前, 该属性不可用。The CodeDOM property is typically generated as part of the compilation step of the script engine, so it is not available until after a call to the IVsaEngine.Compile method. 某些 VSA 实现可能能够动态提供 CodeDOM, 无需显式编译步骤, 但主机不能依赖于这种行为。Some VSA implementations may be able to provide the CodeDOM dynamically, without the need for an explicit compilation step, but hosts cannot rely on this behavior. 某些脚本引擎 (例如, JScript .NET 脚本引擎) 不支持此行为。Some script engines, for example, the JScript .NET script engine, do not support this behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveEventSource(string eventSourceName) cil managed

param.name: eventSourceName
param.span: 要移除的事件源的编程名称。

span.span: The programmatic name of the event source to be removed.

summary.span: 从代码项中移除指定的事件源。

span.span: Removes the specified event source from the code item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 删除事件源不会从源文本中删除基础事件处理程序。Removing an event source does not remove the underlying event handler from source text. 相反, 事件不再向事件处理程序引发通知。Rather, events no longer raise notifications to the event handler. 因此, 如果删除事件源但将基础函数保留在源代码中, 则会收到编译器错误。Therefore, you will get a compiler error if you delete an event source but leave the underlying function in the source code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SourceText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SourceText : string with get, set

summary.span: 设置或获取指定的代码项的文本，包括自动生成的代码（如果有）。

span.span: Sets or gets the text of a specified code item, including auto-generated code, if any.
The source text of the code item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性时, 不会对文本进行验证。When you set this property, the text is not subjected to validation. 出于此原因, 错误 (如果有) 将在下一次调用 IVsaEngine 方法时出现。For this reason, errors, if any, will surface on the next call to the IVsaEngine.Compile method. SourceText 属性以一个大字符串的形式返回源文本, 包括格式化字符, 如回车符。The SourceText property returns the source text in one large string, including formatting characters such as carriage returns. 若要获取此属性, 引擎不能关闭。To get this property the engine must not be closed. 若要设置此属性, 引擎不得关闭, 并且引擎不得运行。To set this property the engine must not be closed, and the engine must not be running.
